Roles and Responsibilities

Academic project                                                             
GSM approach to implement On-Line Power Transformer Monitoring using PLC This  project  deals  with  the  Generator  transformer  (shortly  called  G.T)  - for  effective  cooling
protection system arrangement, thereby ensuring safe and reliable transmission. We made an attempt
to introduce PLC for cooling and protection of this type of transformers.
Technologies: PLC and GSM
